abstract: Federal target of 54.5 mpg by 2025, along with anticipated carbon dioxide emissions rules in Europe, has deluxe brands scrambling to increase fuel efficiency and design smaller vehicles.
snippet: A federal target of 54.5 m.p.g. by 2025, along with anticipated carbon dioxide emissions rules in Europe, has deluxe brands scrambling to increase fuel efficiency.
lead_paragraph: A federal target of 54.5 m.p.g. by 2025, along with anticipated carbon dioxide emissions rules in Europe, has deluxe brands scrambling to increase fuel efficiency.

headline.main: It’s Expensive and Classy, but It’s No Longer a Boat
headline.print_headline: It’s Expensive and Classy, But It’s No Longer a Boat
headline.seo: Environmental Rules Force Luxury Brands to Downsize
